package:
hironx_rpc_server 0.0.1 This package provides RPC (Remote Procedure Call) server feature for higher level of robot operations for the Hironx-variant robots (i.e. Hironx, NEXTAGE Open).
Keio University Yamaguchi Lab TORK BSD http://wiki.ros.org/hironx_rpc https://github.com/start-jsk/rtmros_hironx https://github.com/start-jsk/rtmros_hironx/issues
catkin roslint hironx_ros_bridge hironx_rpc_msgs hrpsys hrpsys_ros_bridge tork_rpc_util rostest
